descriptionHtml:
Tired of your conjured Atronach disappearing mid battle? Or having your Bound Weapon dispel at a crucial moment during a tough confrontation? Well this ESP. file will make them last longer without having it cost you more than what it did before. All bound weapons last for 500 seconds and all conjured combatants, like dremoras and atronatchs, will get double duration. 

Only Affects-

Bound sword

Bound Battleaxe

Bound Bow

Flame Atronach

Frost Atronach

Storm Atroach 

Conjure Familiar

Conjure Dragon Priest

Conjure Dremora Lord
author: Striarii
